text.forgottengraves.command.graves: [Graves] That command hasn't been implemented yet.
text.forgottengraves.command.reloadserve: [Graves] The server config has been reloaded.
text.forgottengraves.command.serversave: [Graves] The server config has been updated.
error.forgottengraves.command.serversave: [Graves] The server config could not be updated.
error.forgottengraves.command.notplayer: [Graves] You must run this as a valid player.
text.autoconfig.forgottengraves.title: Forgotten Graves Settings
text.autoconfig.forgottengraves.option.m: Can players retrieve other players' graves?
Should the coords of the grave be sent in chat?
text.forgottengraves.mark_coords: Your grave has spawned at [x: %d, y: %d, z: %d]
text.autoconfig.forgottengraves.option.m: Min. operator level needed to override protection?
What happens to the items when they're retrieved?
How should the graves store XP?
(Custom XP) What's the max amount of levels that you want stored?
text.autoconfig.forgottengraves.option.i: What is the max percentage an item can decay at one time?
Should item decay ever completely break an item?
text.autoconfig.forgottengraves.option.s: Note: These settings cannot be handled by the client.
Should players be able to rob graves?
Minimum OP level to override grave protection?
What options should be handled by the client?
